landing.bio: I am computer network researcher at Lomonosov Moscow State University. I was developing resources allocation algorithm for datacenters, caching algorithm for CDN. Worked with SDN/NFV. My tech stack includes Python and C++. Python for data analysis and fast scripting, C++ to implement applied algorithms.

experience.aboutWork: SDN/NFV, Openstack, Python, C++ algorithm for datacenters and CDN

interests.paragraphOne: I am interested in programming and research in computer network.
interests.paragraphTwo: I like running, workout, and reading books (technical, fictional works, and self-development books). I develop my intellect, body, and spirit.

awards.awardDetail: (2018) Master in the field of Study Applied Mathematics and Computer Science Graduated with High Honors
(2016) Bachelor in the field of Study Applied Mathematics and Computer Science Graduated with High Honors

(14-16 Aug 2020) 2-nd place in hackathon AC-VO&PPR Hackathon: https://hacathon.ac-vo.pp.ru/. Case: Module for analyzing user behavior in the network. Determining the type of attacks using machine learning. News: https://www.vedomosti.ru/press_releases/2020/08/21/programmnii-produkt-sovmestno-s-mgu-provel-onlain-hakaton-po-neirotehnologiyam-i-iskusstvennomu-intellektu
